Demonstrations Listed by Top-Level Domain

See the quick tour for a smaller set of demos that highlight the key features of Ptolemy II.

Continuous Time

  • Car Tracking
  • Compared Clocks (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
  • Helicopter Control
  • Level Crossing Detector (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
  • Lorenz Attractors
  • Sampled Clocks (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
  • MEMS accelerometer
  • Square Wave Response
  • Sticky Point Masses
  • Switching Continuous Signals using Modal Models
  • Transmission (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
  • Thermostat
  • Units

Discrete Event

  • Inspection Paradox
  • Modal Model (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
  • Router
  • Timing Paradox (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)

Finite State Machine

  • Alternating Bit
  • Blending
  • Chained Transitions (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
  • Modal Binary Symmetric Channel (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
  • State Tracker (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)

Process Networks

  • Ordered Merge
  • QR

Synchronous Data Flow

  • Butterfly
  • Expression
  • Eye Diagram
  • Fixed-Point FIR Filter
  • Fixed-Point Arithmetic
  • Fourier Series (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
  • Karplus-Strong Sound Synthesis
  • LMS Adaptive Filter
  • Maximum Entropy Spectrum
  • Matlab in CT Windows only, requires that Matlab be installed locally
  • Matlab in SDF Windows only, requires that Matlab be installed locally
  • Network Integration
  • Ptolemnizer (using Python) (New in Ptolemy II 3.0) (Does not work under Web Start)
  • Python Integration (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
  • Sketched Signal
  • Slider Parameter and Port Parameters (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
  • Spectrum
  • Sound Spectrum (New in Ptolemy II 3.0)
